item.title: HUGO
item.description: HUGO is an exreamly fast wonderful static website generator (HUGO)[https://gohugo.io]

item.title: Templates
item.description: HTML Templates are stored in separate files normally in an html file that contains an mostly HTML segment along with handlebar like variables {{ .variableName }}. defining template within the GO program import HTML template library. define the template file. execute the template along with passing variables. Import the library import io/html/template Define the template file t, _ := template.ParseFiles("templateName.html") //name of new template is “t” and we do not have an error variable.
